name: LanguageTool
description: Grammar and style checker that can be run locally or self-hosted for privacy. LanguageTool is the sovereign alternative to Grammarly. It is an open-source proofreading software that checks for grammar, style, and spelling errors in over 20 languages. Crucially, it can be hosted on a local server, ensuring no text leaves the organization.
journalism_relevance: Allows proofreading without exposing drafts to third-party cloud services.

time_dividend.reinvestment: Editors can focus on story logic, sourcing, and narrative strength rather than mechanical corrections, improving overall journalistic quality.
